column1: Smoque BBQ////Absolutely loved everything!! The lines were long as mentioned in other reviews
column2: but it went FAST! Don't let it fool you!! (Glad we stayed) Soon as we ordered and our food was ready
column3: our table was too. We definitely will return. Portions were large
column4: for left overs! I can't say what I liked the most
column5: it all was delicious! Very casual dining
column6: small and quiet noisy. Parking is your typical Chicago
column7: pay close to attention to the parking signs! We walked 2 blocks but no problem.
